name: On Order Booking/Receipt of order
subject: New Order
message:
Hello [CUSTOMER],

Your order [ODID] has been received and is under process. You will receive he confirmation SMS once the order is confirmed. Thanks for your order we are delighted to serve you.

name: In Process order message
subject: Order In Process
message:
Hello [CUSTOMER],

Your order is preparing for shipment.Your order Id is [ODID].

name: Order out for delivery
subject: Order Out For Delivery
message:
Hello [CUSTOMER],

Your order [ODID] is out for delivery and will be delivered by delivery agent between [TIMESLOT]. To ensure your safety, the Delivery Agent will drop the package at your doorstep, ring the doorbell and move back 2 meters while waiting for you to collect your package. If you are in a containment zone, the agent will call you and request you to collect your package from the nearest accessible point while following the same No-Contact delivery process.

name: On delivery
subject: Order Delivered
message:
Hello [CUSTOMER],

Your order [ODID] is delivered and received by [RECEIVERNAME].Thanks for giving us an opportunity to serve you. We would like to serve you again soon.

name: On Order Cancellation
subject: Order Cancelled
message:
Hello [CUSTOMER],

Your order [ODID] is cancelled as per your request. Please check mobile app, website for order status , any payment against your order will be transferred to your e-wallet or returned to original source of payment. We will like to serve you soon again.
